Ingredients.2: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle dark beer (such as Guinness®)

Ingredients.4: 1 (3 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet

Ingredients.7: 4 large carrots, peeled and cut into matchstick pieces

Ingredients.8: 1 medium onion, peeled and cut into bite-sized pieces

Directions.1: Combine water, beer, and garlic in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®). Place trivet inside.

Directions.2: Rub all sides of brisket with brown sugar. Place on the trivet and sprinkle spice packet on top. Close and lock the lid.

Directions.3: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 90 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.

Directions.4: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Transfer brisket to a baking sheet.

Directions.5: Cover brisket with aluminum foil; let rest for 15 minutes.

Directions.6: Meanwhile, remove the trivet from the pot. Place potatoes, carrots, onion, and cabbage in the bottom of the pressure cooker. Close and lock the lid.

Directions.7: Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.

Directions.8: Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Serve vegetables with rested brisket.
